description: Manage azure resource manager (ARM) templates in an azure devtest lab.

commands.name: az lab arm-template list
commands.summary: List azure resource manager templates in a given artifact source.

commands.name: az lab arm-template show
commands.summary: Show the details of an ARM template in a lab.
commands.syntax:
az lab arm-template show --artifact-source-name
                         --lab-name
                         --name
                         --resource-group
                         [--export-parameters {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
